channel.title: [Azure/RuneSource] Compiler error...?
channel.description:
Ok, so this is my code in ButtonPacketHandler.java:
[code] for(int i = 0; i < CHOOSE_SKILL.length; i++) {//genie if(buttonId == CHOOSE_SKILL[i]) { player.getSkill().addExp(SKILL_IDS, (player.getSkill().getLevelForXP(player.getSkill().getExp()SKILL_IDS)) * EXP_BONUS); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You recieved some experience!"); } }[/code]

item.title: [Azure/RuneSource] Compiler error...?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
